panels.description: View the absolute difference in average daily traffic counts for selected time periods (Period 1 - Period 2). The average traffic counts include all selected modes. Differences can be viewed for different time buckets.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
COALESCE(ds.hour_bucket, hist.hour_bucket)::TEXT AS bucket,
COALESCE(ds_avg, 0) - COALESCE(historic_avg, 0) AS "Absolute difference: Period 1 - Period 2"
FROM (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS ds_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_1_end'
		AND class_name IN ($classes)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY hour_bucket
	ORDER BY hour_bucket
) ds
FULL OUTER JOIN (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS historic_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_2_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_2_end'
		AND class_name IN ($classes)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY hour_bucket
	ORDER BY hour_bucket
) hist ON (hist.hour_bucket = ds.hour_bucket)
ORDER BY ds.hour_bucket;

panels.title: Difference in average traffic counts for selected periods by time of day

panels.description: View the absolute difference in average daily traffic counts for selected time periods (Period 1 - Period 2). The average traffic counts include all selected modes. Differences can be viewed for different time buckets.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
COALESCE(ds.hour_bucket, hist.hour_bucket)::TEXT AS bucket,
COALESCE(ds_avg, 0) - COALESCE(historic_avg, 0) AS "Absolute difference: Period 1 - Period 2"
FROM (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS ds_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_1_end'
		AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IN ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY hour_bucket
	ORDER BY hour_bucket
) ds
FULL OUTER JOIN (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS historic_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_2_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_2_end'
		AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IN ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket

	ORDER BY hour_bucket
) hist ON (hist.hour_bucket = ds.hour_bucket)
ORDER BY ds.hour_bucket;

panels.title: Difference in average traffic counts for selected periods by time of day

panels.description: View the average weekly counts by modes for each time period.

targets.rawSql:
WITH period_1_rows AS (
SELECT
INITCAP(replace(class_name, '_', ' ')) ::TEXT as metric,
COUNT(*)::NUMERIC / (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM '$period_1_end'::TIMESTAMPTZ - '$period_1_start') / (60 * 60 * 24 * 7)) AS count_period_1
FROM crossings_v4
JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline::int4
AND class_name in ($classes)
AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'
AND crossing_time < '$period_1_end'
GROUP BY class_name
ORDER BY class_name),
period_2_rows AS (
SELECT
INITCAP(replace(class_name, '_', ' ')) ::TEXT as metric,
COUNT(*)::NUMERIC / (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM '$period_2_end'::TIMESTAMPTZ - '$period_2_start') / (60 * 60 * 24 * 7)) AS count_period_2
FROM crossings_v4
JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline::int4
AND class_name in ($classes)
AND crossing_time > '$period_2_start'
AND crossing_time < '$period_2_end'
GROUP BY class_name
ORDER BY class_name)

SELECT COALESCE(period_1_rows.metric, period_2_rows.metric) as metric, period_1_rows.count_period_1 as "Period 1", period_2_rows.count_period_2 as "Period 2"
FROM period_1_rows FULL OUTER JOIN period_2_rows ON period_2_rows.metric = period_1_rows.metric

panels.title: Average weekly counts for selected time periods

panels.description: View the average weekly counts by modes for each time period.

targets.rawSql:
WITH period_1_rows AS (
SELECT
traffic_8_collapsed_class_name ::TEXT as metric,
COUNT(*)::NUMERIC / (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM '$period_1_end'::TIMESTAMPTZ - '$period_1_start') / (60 * 60 * 24 * 7)) AS count_period_1
FROM crossings_v4
JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name in ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)
AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'
AND crossing_time < '$period_1_end'
GROUP BY traffic_8_collapsed_class_name
ORDER BY traffic_8_collapsed_class_name),
period_2_rows AS (
SELECT
traffic_8_collapsed_class_name as metric,
COUNT(*)::NUMERIC / (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM '$period_2_end'::TIMESTAMPTZ - '$period_2_start') / (60 * 60 * 24 * 7)) AS count_period_2
FROM crossings_v4
JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name in ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)
AND crossing_time > '$period_2_start'
AND crossing_time < '$period_2_end'
GROUP BY traffic_8_collapsed_class_name
ORDER BY traffic_8_collapsed_class_name)

SELECT COALESCE(period_1_rows.metric, period_2_rows.metric) as metric, period_1_rows.count_period_1 as "Period 1", period_2_rows.count_period_2 as "Period 2"
FROM period_1_rows FULL OUTER JOIN period_2_rows ON period_2_rows.metric = period_1_rows.metric

panels.title: Average weekly counts for selected time periods

panels.description: View the proportional difference in average daily traffic counts for selected time periods (Period 1 & Period 2). The average traffic counts include all selected modes. Differences can be viewed for different time buckets.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
COALESCE(ds.hour_bucket, hist.hour_bucket)::TEXT AS bucket,
CASE 
  WHEN historic_avg IS NULL THEN NULL
  WHEN historic_avg = 0 THEN NULL
  WHEN ds_avg IS NULL THEN NULL
  WHEN ds_avg = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE ROUND(100 * (ds_avg - historic_avg) / historic_avg)
END AS "Proportional difference: Period 1 & Period 2"
FROM (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS ds_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_1_end'
		AND class_name IN ($classes)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY hour_bucket
	ORDER BY hour_bucket
) ds
FULL OUTER JOIN (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS historic_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_2_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_2_end'
		AND class_name IN ($classes)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY hour_bucket
	ORDER BY hour_bucket
) hist ON (hist.hour_bucket = ds.hour_bucket)
ORDER BY ds.hour_bucket;

panels.title: Difference in average traffic counts for selected periods by time of day

panels.description: View the proportional difference in average daily traffic counts for selected time periods (Period 1 & Period 2). The average traffic counts include all selected modes. Differences can be viewed for different time buckets.

COALESCE(ds.hour_bucket, hist.hour_bucket)::TEXT AS bucket,

		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'

		AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IN ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)

FULL OUTER JOIN (

		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,

		FROM crossings_v4

panels.title: Difference in average traffic counts for selected periods by time of day

panels.description: View the absolute difference in average weekly traffic counts for selected time periods (Period 2 - Period 1). The average traffic counts include all selected modes.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
COALESCE(ds.dow, hist.dow) AS bucket,
COALESCE(ds_avg, 0) - COALESCE(historic_avg, 0) AS "Absolute difference: Period 1 - Period 2"
FROM (
	SELECT
	EXTRACT(isodow FROM bucket) AS isodow,
	trim(to_char(bucket, 'day')) AS dow,
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS ds_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_1_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_1_end'
		AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IN ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY EXTRACT(isodow FROM bucket), dow, hour_bucket
	ORDER BY EXTRACT(isodow FROM bucket), hour_bucket
) ds
FULL OUTER JOIN (
	SELECT
	trim(to_char(bucket, 'day')) AS dow,
	EXTRACT(hour FROM bucket) AS hour_bucket,
	AVG(count) AS historic_avg
	FROM (
		SELECT
		time_bucket('$timeBucketHours hours', crossing_time) AS bucket,
		COUNT(*)
		FROM crossings_v4
		JOIN detection_classes_v2 ON crossings_v4.detection_class_v2_id = detection_classes_v2.id
		WHERE image_space_countline_id = $countline
    AND crossing_time > '$period_2_start'
    AND crossing_time < '$period_2_end'
		AND traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IN ($traffic8CollapsedClassName)
		GROUP BY bucket
		ORDER BY bucket
	) sub
	GROUP BY EXTRACT(isodow FROM bucket), dow, hour_bucket
	ORDER BY EXTRACT(isodow FROM bucket), hour_bucket
) hist ON (hist.dow = ds.dow AND hist.hour_bucket = ds.hour_bucket)
ORDER BY ds.isodow, ds. hour_bucket;

panels.title: Difference in average weekly traffic counts for selected periods by weekday

list.definition: SELECT id FROM countlines_image_space WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY id;
list.label: Countline
list.name: countline
list.query: SELECT id FROM countlines_image_space WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY id;

list.definition: SELECT class_name FROM detection_classes_v2 WHERE id <= 32 ORDER BY id ASC;
list.label: Classes
list.name: classes
list.query: SELECT class_name FROM detection_classes_v2 WHERE id <= 32 ORDER BY id ASC;

list.definition: SELECT traffic_8_collapsed_class_name FROM detection_classes_v2 WHERE traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY traffic_8_collapsed_class_name
list.name: traffic8CollapsedClassName
list.query: SELECT traffic_8_collapsed_class_name FROM detection_classes_v2 WHERE traffic_8_collapsed_class_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY traffic_8_collapsed_class_name
